price: যেতিয়া তেওঁৰ প্ৰতিপালকে তেওঁক পৱিত্ৰ তুৱা উপত্যকাত মাতি কৈছিল,
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
